name: Falling Crate
body:
Complexity Simple
Stealth DC 30 (trained)
Description A wheeled crate dangles haphazardly from wires attached to the eastern wall
-
Disable DC 33 Crafting (expert) to identify which area of the floor to avoid.
AC 28, Fort +20, Ref +20
Hardness 10, HP 70 (BT 35); Immunities critical hits, object immunities, precision damage
Drop and Roll (r) Trigger A creature steps on the marked tile; Effect The wheeled crate's wires snap, rolling down in a straight line and dealing 4d10+26 bludgeoning damage to anyone in the hallway (DC 28 basic Reflex save).
